Hoboken.Morgan Lehman Gallery: Morgan Lehman is a contemporary art gallery representing sixteen internationally renowned American artists working in a diverse array of media. Founded by Sally Morgan and Jay Lehman, the gallery opened in New York City in 2005. Morgan Lehman has mounted the first New York exhibition for a number of artists, including Frohawk Two Feathers, Bret Slater, John Salvest, Paul Wackers, and Andrew Schoultz.
